mapper.select: SELECT c.creditcard_id AS creditcardId, c.user_id AS userId, c.creditcard_name AS creditcardName, b.bank_id AS bankId, b.bank_name AS bankName, c.TransferDate AS TransferDate, c.kindExpense AS kindExpense, c.delete_flag AS deleteFlag FROM creditcard c INNER JOIN bank b ON c.bank_id = b.bank_id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId};

SELECT c.creditcard_id AS creditcardId, c.user_id AS userId, c.creditcard_name AS creditcardName, b.bank_id AS bankId, b.bank_name AS bankName, c.TransferDate AS TransferDate, c.kindExpense AS kindExpense, c.delete_flag AS deleteFlag FROM creditcard c INNER JOIN bank b ON c.bank_id = b.bank_id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} AND c.creditcard_id= #{creditcardId};
